section.name: Recording
section.definition: During a recording session in a Setup Datasets are obtained from Cells and/or a Subject by using various stimuli (Stimulus section).

property.name: Experimenter
property.definition: The name of the person actually performing the recordings.

property.name: StartDate
property.definition: The date the recording session was conducted (YYYY-MM-DD format).

property.name: EndDate
property.definition: The date the recording session ended (YYYY-MM-DD format).

section.name: Behavior
section.definition: Properties for describing an behavioural experiment.

property.name: Protocol
property.definition: A description of the task protocol undertaken by the subject.

property.name: IndividualCount
property.definition: The number of individuals that are observed/investigated at the same time.

property.name: definition
property.definition: A definition of the conducted experiment.

property.name: Description
property.definition: A textual description of the setup.

property.name: Location
property.definition: The location of the setup (e.g. room).

property.name: Department
property.definition: The department where the setup is located.

property.name: Creator
property.value: Jan Grewe, Anatolie Ender, Sandra Dangelmayer string
property.definition: The person who built the setup.

property.name: Maintainer
property.definition: The person who is responsible for the setup maintanance.

property.name: Config
property.definition: An identifier of the used setup configuration, e.g. if variations of the same setup are used.

section.name: Subject
section.definition: The investigated experimental subject (animal or person). May contain the Cell and Preparation sections as subsections.

property.name: Species
property.definition: The scientific name of the species e.g. Apis mellifera, Homo sapiens.

property.name: TrivialName
property.definition: The trivial name of the species like Honeybee, Human.

property.name: Tank
property.definition: The tank in which the subject is housed.

property.name: Comment
property.definition: A general comment on a specific subject.
